tag_list: open-source, foss, jamaica, autosms, watacrackaz, textr-us
overview:
Karl Morris is the creator of TextR.Us AutoSMS, a Firefox add-on and website widget for sending messages to cellphones via Email-to-SMS gateways. It also provides a set of API’s that allows developers to integrate SMS functionality into their own applications and websites.

Karl was a consultant with the Government of Jamaica for issues relating to Open Source and managed FOSS migration projects within the public sector.

He is also the past president of the Jamaica Linux User Group, the only Open Source advocacy, training and support group in the island.

He’s currently pursuing a PhD in Computer Science at Florida International University.

milestones.description: Co-founder of Colada Studios. A mobile app development company.
